patterns.icon_import_pattern: Import Lucide icons as named imports: import { ChevronLeft, ChevronRight } from 'lucide-react'
patterns.icon_usage_pattern: Icons use className for sizing: <Icon className="h-4 w-4" />
patterns.component_pattern: Named exports only (no default exports), 'use client' directive when using hooks/browser APIs
patterns.test_pattern: Vitest with React Testing Library - tests query by aria-label, not text content

existing_implementations.description: Calendar navigation buttons currently use Unicode text characters (‹ U+2039 and › U+203A) instead of Lucide icons

text_chevrons_locations.calendar-view.tsx: Lines 180 (‹ Previous month) and 188 (› Next month)
text_chevrons_locations.calendar-day-view.tsx: Lines 206 (‹ Previous day) and 214 (› Next day)
text_chevrons_locations.calendar-week-view.tsx: Lines 172 (‹ Previous week) and 180 (› Next week)

reference_implementation.pattern: Shows proper Lucide icon import and usage with className="h-4 w-4" sizing (line 37)
